item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-10-17
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Eastern Standard Kitchen (528 Commonwealth Avenue, Boston). #
  • Heading home after a dinner filled with lamb and pillowy gnocchi. Can I find someone to pay me to do that full time? #
  • My dog has suddenly decided that doing laps around the house & acting stupid is a good idea. #
  • Just a chilly sleepy Saturday here in Boston. Done nothing but grab coffee and add some new features to FictFact.com. #

Powered by Twitter Tools
